overview: As Christmas draws near and P.J.'s large family prepares for that special night that comes only once a year, this little Funnybunny can't wait to get his hands on the season's hot new toy, the Superblaster! But when the very last one is donated to a nearby children's home, P.J. despairs that he'll not get his Christmas wish.
title: P.J.'s Unfunnybunny Christmas
